rep_status.Description: Factor indicating whether this image has been already seen.

Levels.first_show: Factor level indicating the first display of this face.
Levels.immediate_repeat: Factor level indicating this face was the same as previous one.
Levels.delayed_repeat: Factor level indicating face was seen 5 to 15 trials ago.

rep_lag.Description: How face images before this one was the image was previously presented.
